description: This source file is a stub implementation for a Supabase client within a FastAPI backend project. It conditionally provides a placeholder client based on configuration settings, without importing external SDKs. The function get_supabase() returns either a stub object or None depending on whether Supabase is enabled and properly configured.

methods.name: Optional[Any] get_supabase()
methods.description: Returns a placeholder Supabase client object if configured; otherwise None.
